tool_description: Semantic Analysis for Vacation Rental / Apartment Reviews - Language Understanding API (142 dedicated Semantic Models) designed, trained&tested on Vacation Rentals, Home Rentals, and Apartments Reviews.
name: Semantic Analysis for Apartment Reviews
title: Semantic Analysis for Apartment Reviews

api_list.name: process
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns all results in one output: general sentiment, aspects, categories, semantic analysis, and a semantic summary. So, you pay only once.

The input "text" is required, the input "title" is optional.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: We got this apartment because of its cheap price and near to the centre. The bedroom was a little bit small and the bed was not that comfortable. There was a lot of lovely decorations and it was nice. There was very fast wifi, which was great. However there was no parking spaces in front of the house so we spend some time sechrching for a place. Also the neigherhood was full of drunken people, probably it was because the house was not that far from downtown and beach and there was a lot of homeless people Will not come back.
